DASHBOARD.clickIcon1: Click the icon to take your test, you have absolutely
DASHBOARD.clickIcon2: minutes to do all of the tests below

INSTRUCTION.title: Instruction
INSTRUCTION.timeLimit: The time limit for this test can be found at the top right corner.
INSTRUCTION.readQuestion: Read the following questions and select the best answer.
INSTRUCTION.haveComplete: Once you have completed the test,
INSTRUCTION.reviewListening: Review the questions before listening to the audio file(s).
INSTRUCTION.listenCarefully: Listen carefully to the audio file(s) and select the best answer.
INSTRUCTION.readingPassage: Review the questions before reading the passage.
INSTRUCTION.eachAudio: Each audio recording can be played only twice.
INSTRUCTION.makeSure3: Press “Mic Check” button below to test your microphone.
INSTRUCTION.tap1: Tap the microphone and record the following 15 sentences.
INSTRUCTION.tap2: You can record each sentence twice.
INSTRUCTION.speakingInstruction: Please click on the microphone icon to record your voice
INSTRUCTION.speakingInstruction2: Please click here to stop recording

TOEIC.title: TOEIC Listening and Reading Test
TOEIC.desc1: This test assesses English-language listening and reading skills.
TOEIC.desc2: The entire test is 200 questions long and will last 129 minutes. There are 4
TOEIC.desc3: parts in the Listening Test section (100 questions) and 3 parts in the
TOEIC.instruction1-2: button at the bottom to move to the next question(s).
TOEIC.instruction2-2: icon at the bottom left corner to go back to
TOEIC.instruction3-1: There may be more than 1 question on the same screen.
TOEIC.listenInstruction: In the Listening test, you will be asked to demonstrate how well you understand spoken English. The entire Listening test will last approximately 53 minutes. There are 4 parts, and directions are given for each part. Listen and select the correct answer.
TOEIC.readingInstruction: In the Reading test, you will read a variety of texts and answer several different types of reading comprehension questions. The entire Reading test will last 75 minutes. There are three parts, and directions are given for each part. Select the correct answer for each question.
TOEIC.timerStart: The timer will start when you click the START button.
TOEIC.endOfTest: This is the end of the test. If you finish before the time is up, you may go back to Parts 1, 2, 3, and 4 to check your work.
TOEIC.endOfTest57: This is the end of the test. If you finish before the time is up, you may go back to Parts 5, 6, and 7 to check your work.

APTITUDE.instruction: In each of the following, choose from a scale of 1 - 5 which of these statements you most agree with or is most applicable to yourself. Choose 5 for most agree=most applicable, down to 1 for least agree=least applicable.
